pacman.api.java
Interface Movable

All Known Subinterfaces:
Ghost, Pac
public interface Movable

An interface for any movable objects (Ghosts and Pacman)

Author:
e.zhu

Method Summary
 java.awt.Point getCenter()
          Get the current center pixel of the movable as a Point object
 MoveDir getDir()
          Get the current direction of the movable.
 java.awt.Point getTile()
          Get the current tile of the movable as a Point object
 int getTileX()
          Get the x value (column index) of the movable’s position in the tiled representation of maze (maze matrix)
 int getTileY()
          Get the y value (row index) of the movable’s position in the tiled representation of maze (maze matrix)
 int getX()
          Get the x value of the movable’s center position in Pixel Coordinate.
 int getY()
          Get the y value of the movable’s center position in Pixel Coordinate.
